timeline.message: Update Commons Merge branch 'master' into dshekhar/BFD-461-BFD_Commons

timeline.bodyText:
I'm thinking we should stay consistent and utilize JS Doc {@link

replies.bodyText: Some of the Java doc comments have been modified to be independent of HAPI FHIR data model version to be available as a common component for both BFD v1 and BFD v2.
replies.author: dshekhar18

timeline.bodyText: I would suggest we keep using JS Doc {@link to be consistent with other comments. The same comment applies to all changed comments in this PR.
